attributes.action: Car insurance to low their price every year, if you have no fault accidents.
attributes.additional_details:
They should change the law how these car insurance companies charge their customers, even if you have accidents no fault, why should I pay higher policy if the other driver was not focused enough on the road.
The insurance should be cheaper every year going down on price if you haven't being convicted for driving, or no accidents.
attributes.background: Every year the car insurance company they hike the price with hundreds of pounds even if the individual has no points, or no fault accidents, there is no difference that you have no claim bonus, they still put the price up. Is not fair, they should lower their price every year for customers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Cap car insurance prices - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703058
